name: Fairmint
description: Equity token of Fairmint.com, a provider of software for businesses and DAOs to conduct compliant stock and token offerings for fundraising and community compensation. Fairmint software allows users to integrate an offering webpage in minutes, setup their fundraising and/or compensation offerings, and start issuing digital assets on a public blockchain network of their choice. Users are provided dashboards and tools to manage governance and compliance requirements, and have full control and custody over all aspects of their digital assets and offerings.
